body_html:
Hey @yaroslavvb thanks for your response. I will use tcmalloc and try to diagnose what exactly is going on. Do you recommend just running it like this?

LD_PRELOAD=/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4 HEAPPROFILE=/tmp/profile python timestep_network.py

body:
Hey @yaroslavvb thanks for your response. I will use `tcmalloc` and try to diagnose what exactly is going on. Do you recommend just running it like this?

`LD_PRELOAD=/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4 HEAPPROFILE=/tmp/profile python timestep_network.py`
